channel.title: Soho Theme on Antonio Muñoz
channel.description: Recent content in Soho Theme on Antonio Muñoz

item.title: Necrognomicon Journey
item.description: Hi everyone! I’ve thought that it would be a good idea to post an article talking about what I’ve developed in Necrognomicon, just in case anyone has curiosity or want to know more about the development process.

item.title: About Me (extended)
item.description: Hi folks! My name is Antonio Muñoz. I’m from Murcia, Spain.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi folks! My name is Antonio Muñoz. I’m from Murcia, Spain.

item.title: First One
item.description: Hi everybody! I’m Antonio Mu/oz from Murcia, Spain. I’m working on a video game called NECROGNOMICON.

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: HOME Hit N’ Rush HOME Hit N’ Rush is a team-based online multiplayer third-person shooter taking place in a distant future where humanity is at the brink of extinction.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
